tool.name: summarizeRasters

param.name: stat_list
param.expression: Raster Dataset {Statistic Type} {Summary Field Name};Raster Dataset {Statistic Type} {Summary Field Name}...

tool.summary: The Summarize Rasters tool takes any polygon dataset as an input, and statistically summarizes user-selected attributes per polygon feature for one or more raster datasets that intersect that polygon. As an example, the user could specify a polygon dataset representing watersheds. The tool could calculate the mean elevation found within each watershed polygon, based on a spatially coincident digital elevation model.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: The Summarize Rasters tool takes any polygon dataset as an input, and statistically summarizes user-selected attributes per polygon feature for one or more raster datasets that intersect that polygon. As an example, the user could specify a polygon dataset representing watersheds. The tool could calculate the mean elevation found within each watershed polygon, based on a spatially coincident digital elevation model.
